newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: OPTIONS -- AEX options feature in livelier session.
newsitem.headline: OPTIONS -- AEX options feature in livelier session.

text.p: The European Options Exchange saw more activity on Wednesday after two days of slow trading at the beginning of the week, market makers said. Calls well outnumbered puts on the day as investors looked to profit from the positive market reaction to the U.S. election result

With the AEX moving again, index options dominated trade, making up around 24 percent of the total contracts traded. There was interest in ING calls as well as those of retailer Ahold, which has been on a good run recently. With Ahold shares opening and closing at 104.90 guilders, there was a lot of activity in the January contract at 105.00 strike.
ING calls beat puts by 10,703 to 1508, while Ahold saw 5,997 calls against 1,497 puts.
